name: Perth
fun_fact: Fun fact: Western Australia has some of the most biodiverse vegetation on Earth, producing unique wildflower honeys you can't find anywhere else - and the Wildflower restaurant celebrates all six Indigenous Noongar seasons in its menu!

hero_dishes.name: Western Australian Rock Lobster
hero_dishes.description: Fresh crayfish grilled with garlic butter
hero_dishes.origin_story: WA's pristine waters produce world-renowned rock lobster
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Fremantle seafood restaurants, upscale Perth dining

hero_dishes.name: Meat Pie
hero_dishes.description: Flaky pastry with beef, gravy, onions - Australian icon
hero_dishes.origin_story: Perth elevates classic with gourmet versions including kangaroo meat
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Bakeries throughout city, gourmet versions at cafes

hero_dishes.name: Fremantle Sardines
hero_dishes.description: Fresh sardines marinated with olive oil, lemon, and herbs

hero_dishes.name: Native Australian Cuisine
hero_dishes.description: Indigenous ingredients like bush tomato, lemon myrtle, wattleseed
hero_dishes.origin_story: Celebrating Nyoongar seasons and native ingredients
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Wildflower restaurant with Swan River views

signature_drinks.name: WA Craft Beer
signature_drinks.how_locals_drink_it: At breweries in Fremantle and throughout Perth

signature_drinks.name: Margaret River Wine
signature_drinks.description: World-class wines from nearby Margaret River region
signature_drinks.how_locals_drink_it: At wine bars and with meals

food_culture_notes: Twilight Food Market (October-March) transforms Friday nights in Forrest Place
Long Chim by David Thompson brings Bangkok street food
Emily Taylor in Fremantle fuses WA produce with Asian flavors
Old Shanghai food court has retro Chinese ambiance since decades

unique_modern: most isolated major city in world
